title: 114: Getting Friendly with Your Fertility
itunes:title: 114: Getting Friendly with Your Fertility
description:
(DISCLAIMER: This episode DOES NOT replace a FAM lesson - a full class(es) should be properly taken before using FAM or charting cycles for birth control!) 
TRIGGER WARNING: Fertility will be discussed - as well as the attempt to avoid pregnancy and/or become pregnant. For all of our dear listeners who have struggled through a journey of infertility, we will soon be releasing an episode discussing this. 
The Broads are joined by fertility awareness method educator and #broadsquad member, Nathalie Daudet! She discusses how she got started using FAM and why she loves it (fertility awareness method). We chat about FAM basics, how it differs from other methods of birth control, who is a good candidate for FAM, how IMPORTANT it is to go through an instructor/expert before starting your FAM journey, the value of our cycles and how powerful a tool they can be for us, and much more! Find out more information about FAM and Nathalie below:
***FAM does not protect against STI’s - please listen to find out more ()
NATHALIE DAUDET AND FERTILITY AWARENESS PROJECT:
Website: Fertilityawarenessproject.ca (http://fertilityawarenessproject.ca/)
Instagram: Fertility Awareness Project instagram (https://www.instagram.com/fertilityawarenessproject/?hl=en)
Blog w/ resources: blog (https://fertilityawarenessproject.ca/blog)
Instructor Directory: https://fertilityawarenessmethodofbirthcontrol.com/fam-educator-directory/
***And book discussed in episode is: “Taking Charge of Your Fertility”
